divs: Sighting Details 1. We were staying at a hotel across the streetfrom the Reno Airport.2. I5B Ed5D was looking out the window at the night sky.3. At first I thought that I wasseeing a slow moving plane but it was moving too slow.4. I was over joyed atseeing what I thought was my first UFO encounter. I woke up Stewart so he couldsee the lights. By that time they had turned brighter and formed an almoststraight line.5. Saw 4 lights forming square and 3 light forming triangle. Triangle lights were in front of square lights and they all moved in a uniformpattern going south. Lights were approaching Reno Airport. Lights changed fromuniform pattern to almost a straight line and they got brighter as they went outof sight. 6. Lost sight of lights when they went behind the hotel.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around September 6th 2002
